title: Vedge: 100 Plates Large and Small That Redefine Vegetable
description:
Rich Landau, Kate Jacoby, "Vedge: 100 Plates Large and Small That Redefine Vegetable Cooking"
ISBN: 1615190856 | 2013 | EPUB | 256 pages | 4 MB

The most exciting vegetable cooking in the nation is happening at Vedge, where in an elegant nineteenth-century townhouse in Philadelphia, chef-proprietors Rich Landau and Kate Jacoby serve exceptionally flavorful fare that is wowing vegans, vegetarians, and carnivores alike.

Now, Landau and Jacoby share their passion for ingenious vegetable cooking. The more than 100 recipes hereÃ¢â‚¬â€such as Fingerling Potatoes with Creamy Worcestershire Sauce, Pho with Roasted Butternut Squash, Seared French Beans with Caper Bagna Cauda, and Eggplant BracioleÃ¢â‚¬â€explode with flavor but are surprisingly straightforward to prepare.

At dessert, fruit takes center stage in dishes like Blueberries with Pie Crust and Lemonade Ice CreamÃ¢â‚¬â€but vegetables can still steal the show, like in the Beetroot Pots de Creme.
